beers.notes: Notes of black tea, wildflower honey, white table grapes, and pumpernickel.
beers.description: English Mild. 4.2% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malts. Gently hopped in the kettle with Loral and over 30lbs of Medjool Dates.
beers.summary:
English Mild. 4.2% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malts. Gently hopped in the kettle with Loral and over 30lbs of Medjool Dates.
Notes of black tea, wildflower honey, white table grapes, and pumpernickel.

beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #21. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #21. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of bubble tea, sticky marshmallow, green tea mocha, and cream puffs.
beers.description: Milkshake IPA. 7.2% The latest heavily amplified psychedelic riff on THE boundary-pushing Culinary IPA series. Brewed with gobs of oats, taro root, and lactose sugar.  Conditioned atop of luscious Tahitian vanilla beans and taro root powder. Intensely hopped and then dry hopped with Mosaic and Citra.
beers.summary:
Milkshake IPA. 7.2% The latest heavily amplified psychedelic riff on THE boundary-pushing Culinary IPA series. Brewed with gobs of oats, taro root, and lactose sugar.  Conditioned atop of luscious Tahitian vanilla beans and taro root powder. Intensely hopped and then dry hopped with Mosaic and Citra.
Notes of bubble tea, sticky marshmallow, green tea mocha, and cream puffs.

beers.notes: Notes of late harvest Sauvignon Blanc, guava smoothie, dragon fruit, and strawberry gelato.
beers.description: Kiwi Double IPA. 8.0% Brewed with heaps of pillowy oats. Hopped in the kettle with Zythos then aggressively dry hopped with hand selected Nelson Sauvin. Conditioned on an enormous amount of house processed kiwis.
beers.summary:
Kiwi Double IPA. 8.0% Brewed with heaps of pillowy oats. Hopped in the kettle with Zythos then aggressively dry hopped with hand selected Nelson Sauvin. Conditioned on an enormous amount of house processed kiwis.
Notes of late harvest Sauvignon Blanc, guava smoothie, dragon fruit, and strawberry gelato.

beers.notes: Notes of ripe melon, underripe mango, orange pith, and grapefruit rind.
beers.description: Crushable IPA. 5.9% Brewed with heaps of pillowy oats. Assertively hopped in the kettle with Zythos then dry hopped with a massive amount of hand selected Nelson Sauvin and Amarillo.
beers.summary:
Crushable IPA. 5.9% Brewed with heaps of pillowy oats. Assertively hopped in the kettle with Zythos then dry hopped with a massive amount of hand selected Nelson Sauvin and Amarillo.
Notes of ripe melon, underripe mango, orange pith, and grapefruit rind.

beers.notes: Notes of U-Pick farm fields, fruit leather, underripe blueberry, fresh berry jam.
beers.description: Strawberry Table Bier. 4.9% Brewed with spelt and lightly hopped with Idaho7. Conditioned for many moons on heaps of house made strawberry puree.
beers.summary:
Strawberry Table Bier. 4.9% Brewed with spelt and lightly hopped with Idaho7. Conditioned for many moons on heaps of house made strawberry puree.
Notes of U-Pick farm fields, fruit leather, underripe blueberry, fresh berry jam.

beers.notes: Notes of macaroon, frozen cocktail with a tiny umbrella, lemongrass, and coral.
beers.description: Coconut White Bier. 5.0% Brewed with raw wheat and oats. Hopped thoughtfully with Melba, Cascade and coriander. Fermented with our saison yeast and one of our favorite Brett strains. Conditioned on a delicate amount of toasted coconut.
beers.summary:
Coconut White Bier. 5.0% Brewed with raw wheat and oats. Hopped thoughtfully with Melba, Cascade and coriander. Fermented with our saison yeast and one of our favorite Brett strains. Conditioned on a delicate amount of toasted coconut.
Notes of macaroon, frozen cocktail with a tiny umbrella, lemongrass, and coral.

beers.notes: Notes of celery soda, lemon peel, barnyard, lime juice, and a summer garden.
beers.description: Spiced Saison. 4.5% Brewed with wheat and spiced with pink peppercorn, curry powder, and lovage. Fermented with our Magickal Saison yeast.
beers.summary:
Spiced Saison. 4.5% Brewed with wheat and spiced with pink peppercorn, curry powder, and lovage. Fermented with our Magickal Saison yeast.
Notes of celery soda, lemon peel, barnyard, lime juice, and a summer garden.
